Ok, basically the easiest way to get programs is to use what is known as the repositories, or repos.  In the repos are collections of programs.  There are different repos you can add or remove  such as universe, multiverse, etc.  Anyway, for the most part, you can follow the guides here http://ubuntuguide.org/wiki/Dapper  or the official wiki at wiki.ubuntu.com  Ubuntuguide is a little more noob friendly in my opinion
